title: Eien Pressure
text:
is the 29th <a href="major%20label">major</a> <a href="music%20single">single</a> by the Japanese female <a href="Japanese%20idol">idol</a> group <a href="AKB48">AKB48</a>, released in Japan on December 5, 2012.
Background.
The sixteen members that were featured in the title track were decided in the AKB48 <a href="rock-paper-scissors">rock-paper-scissors</a> tournament held in September along with their position at <a href="Nippon%20Budokan">Nippon Budokan</a>. The overall winner of the tournament was <a href="Haruka%20Shimazaki">Haruka Shimazaki</a>, who sang the lead vocals for the song and took up the center position during its performances, and it is also her first solo center.
The single was released in five versions: Type-A, Type-B, Type-C, Type-D, and Theater Edition.
The third tracks of the DVDs that come with Types A, B, and C are <a href="music%20video">music video</a>s for the songs that placed, respectively, first, second, and third in the recently held Music Video Request, in which fans could vote for a song to get a music video.
Its music video was directed by Eiki Takahashi (also director of <a href="Keibetsu%20Shiteita%20Aij%C5%8D">Keibetsu Shiteita Aijō</a>). It premiered on <a href="MTV%20Japan">MTV Japan</a>.
This is also the first single where <a href="Kojima%20Haruna">Kojima Haruna</a> does not participate in the single's A-side track.
Track listing.
All lyrics written by <a href="Yasushi%20Akimoto">Yasushi Akimoto</a>, except "Eien Yori Tsuzuku Yō ni". "Eien Yori Tsuzuku Yō ni" is written by Hisaya Okada (<a href="Mecha-Mecha%20Iketeru%21">Mecha-Mecha Iketeru!</a>'s staff).
Members.
"Eien Pressure".
Center: <a href="Haruka%20Shimazaki">Haruka Shimazaki</a>
The rank of each member in the AKB48 29th single selection rock-paper-scissors tournament is in parentheses.
"Tsuyogari Tokei".
The song is performed by <a href="SKE48">SKE48</a>.
"Ha!".
The song is performed by <a href="NMB48">NMB48</a>.
"Hatsukoi Butterfly".
The song is performed by <a href="HKT48">HKT48</a>.
"Eien Yori Tsuzuku Yō ni".
The song is performed by OKL48 which is the member is selected from "<a href="AKB48">AKB48</a>" who lose at Janken tournament for single "Eien Pressure" .
Charts.
Year-end charts.
"Eien Pressure" was grouped with the 2013 year for Billboard Japan.
